title: $2,400 / 2br - 1000ft+ - Spacious 2 Bedroom - Reading, MA
posting_body: Spacious 2 bedroom townhouse style apartment in desirable West Side of Reading with 2 large bedrooms upstairs (one with a walk in closet in the larger bedroom and 2 closets in the other bedroom).
The apartment also includes a well-sized living room, a formal dining room and a large kitchen with dishwasher & disposal.
Unit has laundry hookups on the 1st floor.
The apartment is the front unit of a two family house in a mostly single family neighborhood, has off street parking for 2 cars, its own deck off the side and a small open farmers porch out front.
The unit has carpet, all new windows, new forced hot air by gas heat and central A/C! 1 mile from either routes 95 or 93, and 1 mile to the Reading MBTA station.
Reading has free parking (the pass is $25/ year) for residents at the Reading MBTA train station for those folks that take the train into work (25 minutes to North Station).
